name: Tennis Champion
description:
Realistic Tennis Physics combined with great swipe controls to give the best tennis experience on mobile! Compete against Friends in Online Multiplayer or Split Screen Multiplayer mode. Beautiful 3D graphics, swipe controls, 3D Physics, and plenty of game modes make this the best tennis for mobile!

This is the first game to bring online tennis multiplayer as well as split screen multiplayer. Split screen multiplayer can be played with your friends on a single device. While the online multiplayer can be played anywhere through a WIFI connection.

Enjoy
